name: Ambulance Rescue Driving 3D
description:
Ambulance Rescue Driving 3D:
Get Ready to Drive a Army Truck Simulator for rescue mission.Have you ever tried to save the human lives? Well there is nothing more satisfying than to save human lives in the emergency medical rescue mission when you are in the battlefield. This game is all about fighting against the evil, falling down and then getting up again. You have a Rescue truck which is equipped with Medicare. Drive your rescue truck with care and do not crash it.
Army rescue offroad war truck simulator drive game is here to save injured soldier in battlefield missions. Do you love to rescue the military soldier's games? You have to hire an army vehicles driver. You have to drive an army vehicle and you have to put your driving skills and prepare yourself for a dangerous ride on the mountains. You have a military truck game. You have played many army vehicle games, but this rescue game is different from others. So it's a part of daring rescue squad for mountain ambulance truck in this simulator. It will have fun while rescuing the troops from the war field like no other rescue games. This will teach you how to save the injured soldiers in an emergency situation and perform rescue duties as the best driver.
Game Feature:
Amazing 3D environment
Real life sound effects
Addictive game play
Engaging rescue missions
Simulation game with Army based theme
Various levels to challenge others
Medical Truck to Rescue
